Summary: light appered in sky while filming dry lighting storm
divs: Sighting Detailsmy friend was out side takeing video of the dry lighting storm in the foot hills saw a bright dot appear and stay for a sec then called me to grab my camera which is a sanyo vpc-e2100 with 21x OPTICAL ZOOM. so we got this wierd set of glowing orbs or balls on video and would like to try and get a unbiased opion of what is is or may be. i was on my front porch and my friend was in his yard
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Eagle
There were no other sightings in Eagle on or around March 23rd 2012
